definitions.definition: The academic staff at schools , colleges , universities or not-for-profit research institutes, as opposed to the students or support staff.

examples: She transferred from the Faculty of Science to the Faculty of Medicine.
He lived until he reached the age of 90 with most of his faculties intact.

definitions.definition: An authority , power, or privilege conferred by a higher authority.
A licence to make alterations to a church .

main_definition: ( chiefly Canada , US , Philippines ) The academic staff at schools , colleges , universities or not-for-profit research institutes, as opposed to the students or support staff.
secondary_definitions: ( Often in the plural ) : an ability , power , or skill .
An authority , power, or privilege conferred by a higher authority.
( Church of England ) A licence to make alterations to a church .
